ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.rim

Class RIMDHKeyPairGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.DHKeyPairGenerator
      • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.rim.RIMDHKeyPairGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyPairGenerator

    public class RIMDHKeyPairGenerator
extends DHKeyPairGenerator
    Generates a public/private keypair for the Diffie-Hellman key exchange. The private key (x) is a randomly generated sequence of bits, and the public key is computed using gx mod p. The parameters x, g, and p are the constants DH_P, DH_G, DH_L defined in this class.

    • Field Summary
